description:
This spacious basement studio apartment is located near one of the most cultured Streets in Brooklyn, Utica Ave. Being just 10 minutes from the Flatbush Ave Junction and 30 minutes from the city by car; you'll love my place as a getaway from the hustle and bustle of NYC

This spacious Brooklyn studio apartment is a rare find. This studio is located in the basement of a private home in a quiet welcoming neighborhood. The space can fit up to 4 guests comfortably. Great for couples, solo adventures, business travelers and very pet friendly.

Guests will be able to access all parts of this space in the apartment. Access to the backyard can be granted at request while booking for an additional fee.

This private home is located on a quiet street in a welcoming neighborhood. Where access to public transportation is just seconds away.

This space is a block away from Utica Ave where the B46 bus and dollar vans can transport guests to and from the 4 Train and/or Atlantic Ave. The space is also easy to find if traveling by taxi or car/ gps.
name: Spacious Studio in E Flatbush
